name: Gaur Money
introduce: Gaur.Money is an algorithmic token pegged to $ETH on the Cronos network. The underlying logic of the protocol dynamically modifies the supply of $GAUR, driving its price up or down concerning the price of $ETH. Long-term maintenance of the Gaur’s peg to 1 $ETH on a 1000:1 ratio is the goal of the protocol’s built-in stability mechanism.
